name: CS3113 Plants vs Aliens
description:
Anxiety-inducing shoot-em-up where you get to play both sides of a war between plants and aliens! Switch back and forth between playing as the plants or as the aliens to ensure that either side steals all the cows from the other and wins the war

Controls: WASD/Arrows to move, Space to shoot, Q to switch perspective

Music: https://pixabay.com/music/search/space/
